sentences.en: China has three operational DAMS on the river's headwaters in Yunnan and two more are being built.
sentences.cn: 中国在云南上游流域有三座正在运行的水坝，目前在建的还有两座。

sentences.en: Most of the sediment directly enters the headwaters of the Mekong River or is deposited in riparian areas where it is entrained during later floods.
sentences.cn: 大部分泥沙直接进入了湄公河上游或是沉降在河岸地区，被日后的洪水中带走。
